short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: subtitles with word by word translation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
jsub gives you word by word translation for subtitles on netflix. this might help you when learning a language.

jsub needs language reactor from the chrome web store to work properly: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/language-reactor/hoombieeljmmljlkjmnheibnpciblicm
